thread.section_title: Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: madisonWilts
title: Excellent
text: After an 11 hour flight from the UK this stopover hotel before starting our vacation was great. Charming welcome by reception staff followed by a large room which had everything we needed. We heard no noise from other rooms and well rested the following morning we enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. The eating area was spotless and the food topped up regularly with plenty of choice. The hotel shuttle was a godsend as well bringing us from the airport and then back in the morning so we could pick up our rental car. We would certainly use this hotel again.
